children.text: A ski lodge re-imagined: Zephyr represents the team’s exploration and interpretation of quick-service dining. With Asian-inspired dishes and a new ordering experience, the Zephyr Lodge boasts great food with an even better view!
Join us at WIld Pine prior to the start of your day for full serve breakfast. Wild Pine also serves lunch and dinner featuring their signature rotisserie chicken and prime rib.

The Lodge at Big Springs is bringing a new twist to your classic mountain dining experience. As the heart of the mountain, this quick-service restaurant features your go-to burgers and pizza, along with new options to choose from! From breakfast to lunch to an apres drink, the Lodge at Big Springs is now serving taqueria options and the brand-new Vista Espresso Bar.
Located next to the ice rink featuring quick snacks, chicken tenders and french fries.
The Overlook Bar is located in the Northstar Village overlooking the Ice Rink and the village center. Enjoy Specialty Signature Cocktails, beer, wine and hot chocolate and sweets for the kids.

data.title: Cabana Bar
data.subtitle: Take in all that the Village has to offer at the Cabana Bar

children.text: The Exciting Cabana bar is located next to the Ice Rink. Features Specialty Signature Cocktails, Beer and Wine

The Rink Bar is a small cozy bar located in the village near the ice rink. The Rink Bar offers specialty signature cocktails. Thre is a an express lane window for those of you that are relaxing around the rink
The Bourbon Pub is a full-service Michael Mina restaurant with a family-friendlt pub atmosphere. With specialty cocktails and an upscale casual menu, try seasonal items or stop in for an apres drink!
At 8,610’ elevation with stunning views of Lake Tahoe, this is the perfect location to grab a quick bite or hot cocoa to fuel up.
Visit Vous for your morning coffee and fresh baked pastries. Return after your day enjoying mountain, gather with friends, and enjoy apres!

data.title: Big Springs Express Ski Patrol Station
Martis Camp Express Ski Patrol Station
